item.description:
Report X-2023100640

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: 4 cans of Denatured Alcohol inside a repacked box. Photos of original packaging show appropriate hazardous labelling. One can was bagged, more dented than the others, and leaking from under the cap, which was not loose. DurationRel: 80 and MitigateEffect: Package was brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2023100711
item.description:
Report X-2023100711

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22

  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023100711-Consumer markings on outside of 5 gallon (non hazmat) item which was part of shipment indicated possibly X-flammable and triggered agent to inspect entirety of shipment including inside large wheeled tote which contained all undeclared dangerous goods X-2023100712-Undeclared dangerous goods discovered in wheeled tote after agent noticed consumer hazard markings on outside of separate item in shipment X-2023100713-undeclared dangerous goods discovered in large wheeled tote after agent noticed consumer flammability warning label on outside of another item in shipment 6 aerosol cans x 13 ounces

item.title: Report X-2023100421
item.description:
Report X-2023100421

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A CALL WAS PLACED TO THE PACKAGE SERVICE CENTER. A PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE WEST SORT AISLE. IT WAS SAID TO BE VIBRATING WHEN FOUND. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER (DR) WAS THEN DISPATCHED TO RETREIVE THE PACKAGE. UPON RETRIEVAL AND OPENING OF THE PACKAGE IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS NOT PROPERLY DECLARED AS A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. A CALL WAS THEN MADE TO HELP DESK.

item.title: Report X-2023100016
item.description:
Report X-2023100016

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 09/13/2023 at approximately 1815, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 4553408 at the station location in Portland, reporting an undeclared corrosive spill. Spillage was detected from two separate shipments, each consisting of two plastic bottles, packageed sideways, in one fiberboard box. Due to an insecure closure, one jug from each box leaked, resulting a spillage. Per an online safety data sheet, these shipments are classified as UN1824 Sodium Hydroxide Solution. Neither package adorned were marked or labeled as dangerous goods, nor did either package have the required paperwork and appropriate packaging, in accordance with IATA regulations. Both shipments are being held, pending an FAA investigation.
